wikipedia_page.main: Admiral Edward Granville George Howard, 1st Baron Lanerton (23 December 1809 – 8 October 1880), was a British naval commander and politician.

George Ponsonby (Junior Lord of the Treasury)
response: * Diana Ponsonby (d. 1893), who married Edward Howard, 1st Baron Lanerton, the fourth son of George Howard, 6th Earl of Carlisle and Lady Georgiana Dorothy (daughter of William Cavendish, 5th Duke of Devonshire).

link_mentions.page: List of current places of worship in Chichester District
response: |This church is almost within the grounds of Woolbeding manor house.  Its heavily buttressed tower (erected in 1728) has a side entrance porch; beyond is a mostly 11th-century nave.  The chancel was rebuilt and lengthened in 1870 for Edward Howard, 1st Baron Lanerton, and a vestry was attached.
